articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Uber pays $178m to settle lawsuit with taxi drivers in Australia - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Law firm behind class action says outcome among most successful legal actions ever taken against the ride-sharing giant.
articles.content:
Uber has agreed to pay $178m to settle a lawsuit with taxi and hire car drivers in Australia who say they lost earnings to the ride-hailing app, a law firm has announced.
Maurice Blackburn Lawyers, … [+1899 chars]
